00029 #include "CHPFileUpdater.h"
00030 #include "CHPFileBufferWriter.h"
00031 
00032 using namespace affxchpwriter;
00033 
00034 CCHPFileBufferWriter::CCHPFileBufferWriter()
00035 {
00036         m_BufferSize = 0;
00037         m_MaxBufferSize = MAX_BUFFER_SIZE;
00038         m_IsGenotype = false;   // default is expression
00039 }
00040 
00041 CCHPFileBufferWriter::~CCHPFileBufferWriter()
00042 {
00043         FlushBuffer();
00044         Cleanup();
00045 }
00046 
00047 void CCHPFileBufferWriter::Cleanup()
00048 {
00049         if (m_IsGenotype)
00050         {
00051                 for (int target=0; target<m_TargetGenotypeEntryBuffers.size(); target++) 
00052                 { 
00053                         m_TargetGenotypeEntryBuffers[target].erase(m_TargetGenotypeEntryBuffers[target].begin(), m_TargetGenotypeEntryBuffers[target].end());
00054                 }
00055                 m_TargetGenotypeEntryBuffers.erase(m_TargetGenotypeEntryBuffers.begin(), m_TargetGenotypeEntryBuffers.end());
00056         }
00057         else
00058         {
00059                 for (int target=0; target<m_TargetExpressionEntryBuffers.size(); target++) 
00060                 { 
00061                         m_TargetExpressionEntryBuffers[target].erase(m_TargetExpressionEntryBuffers[target].begin(), m_TargetExpressionEntryBuffers[target].end());
00062                 }
00063                 m_TargetExpressionEntryBuffers.erase(m_TargetExpressionEntryBuffers.begin(), m_TargetExpressionEntryBuffers.end());
00064         }
00065 }
00066 
00067 void CCHPFileBufferWriter::Initialize(std::vector<std::string> *CHPFileNames, bool IsGenotype)
00068 {
00069         m_CHPFileNames = CHPFileNames;
00070         Cleanup();
00071         for (int i=0; i<m_CHPFileNames->size(); i++)
00072         {
00073                 if (IsGenotype)
00074                 {
00075                         std::vector<GenotypeBufferEntry> entryBuffer;
00076                         m_TargetGenotypeEntryBuffers.push_back(entryBuffer);
00077                 }
00078                 else
00079                 {
00080                         std::vector<ExpressionBufferEntry> entryBuffer;
00081                         m_TargetExpressionEntryBuffers.push_back(entryBuffer);
00082                 }
00083                 m_TargetEntryRowIndexes.push_back(0);
00084         }       
00085         m_BufferSize = 0;
00086         m_IsGenotype = IsGenotype;
00087 }
00088 
00089 void CCHPFileBufferWriter::WriteGenotypeEntry(int target, affxchp::CGenotypeProbeSetResults &entry)
00090 {
00091         GenotypeBufferEntry bufferEntry;
00092         bufferEntry.call = entry.AlleleCall;
00093         bufferEntry.confidence = entry.Confidence;
00094         bufferEntry.RAS1 = entry.RAS1;
00095         bufferEntry.RAS2 = entry.RAS2;
00096         bufferEntry.aaCall = entry.pvalue_AA;
00097         bufferEntry.abCall = entry.pvalue_AB;
00098         bufferEntry.bbCall = entry.pvalue_BB;
00099         bufferEntry.noCall = entry.pvalue_NoCall;
00100         m_TargetGenotypeEntryBuffers[target].push_back(bufferEntry);
00101         m_BufferSize += sizeof(GenotypeBufferEntry);
00102         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00103         {
00104                 FlushBuffer();
00105         }
00106 }
00107 
00108 void CCHPFileBufferWriter::WriteExpressionEntry(int target, affxchp::CExpressionProbeSetResults &entry)
00109 {
00110         ExpressionBufferEntry bufferEntry;
00111         bufferEntry.Detection = entry.Detection;
00112         bufferEntry.DetectionPValue = entry.DetectionPValue;
00113         bufferEntry.Signal = entry.Signal;
00114         bufferEntry.NumPairs = entry.NumPairs;
00115         bufferEntry.NumUsedPairs = entry.NumUsedPairs;
00116         m_TargetExpressionEntryBuffers[target].push_back(bufferEntry);
00117         m_BufferSize += sizeof(ExpressionBufferEntry);
00118         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00119         {
00120                 FlushBuffer();
00121         }
00122 }
00123 
00124 void CCHPFileBufferWriter::FlushBuffer()
00125 {
00126         if(m_BufferSize > 0) {
00127                 if (m_IsGenotype)
00128                 {
00129                         for (int target=0; target<m_CHPFileNames->size(); target++)
00130                         {
00131                                 CCHPFileUpdater updater;
00132                                 updater.OpenCHPFile((*m_CHPFileNames)[target].c_str());
00133                                 for (int i=0; i<m_TargetGenotypeEntryBuffers[target].size(); i++)
00134                                 {
00135                                         GenotypeBufferEntry bufferEntry = m_TargetGenotypeEntryBuffers[target][i];
00136                                         updater.UpdateGenotypeEntry(
00137                                                 m_TargetEntryRowIndexes[target]+i, 
00138                                                 bufferEntry.call,
00139                                                 bufferEntry.confidence,
00140                                                 bufferEntry.RAS1,
00141                                                 bufferEntry.RAS2,
00142                                                 bufferEntry.aaCall,
00143                                                 bufferEntry.abCall,
00144                                                 bufferEntry.bbCall,
00145                                                 bufferEntry.noCall);
00146                                 }
00147                                 updater.CloseCHPFile();
00148                                 m_TargetEntryRowIndexes[target] += m_TargetGenotypeEntryBuffers[target].size();
00149                                 m_TargetGenotypeEntryBuffers[target].erase(m_TargetGenotypeEntryBuffers[target].begin(), m_TargetGenotypeEntryBuffers[target].end());
00150                         }
00151                 }
00152                 else
00153                 {
00154                         for (int target=0; target<m_CHPFileNames->size(); target++)
00155                         {
00156                                 CCHPFileUpdater updater;
00157                                 updater.OpenCHPFile((*m_CHPFileNames)[target].c_str());
00158                                 for (int i=0; i<m_TargetExpressionEntryBuffers[target].size(); i++)
00159                                 {
00160                                         ExpressionBufferEntry bufferEntry = m_TargetExpressionEntryBuffers[target][i];
00161                                         updater.UpdateExpressionEntry(
00162                                                 m_TargetEntryRowIndexes[target]+i, 
00163                                                 bufferEntry.Detection,
00164                                                 bufferEntry.DetectionPValue,
00165                                                 bufferEntry.Signal,
00166                                                 bufferEntry.NumPairs,
00167                                                 bufferEntry.NumUsedPairs);
00168                                 }
00169                                 updater.CloseCHPFile();
00170                                 m_TargetEntryRowIndexes[target] += m_TargetExpressionEntryBuffers[target].size();
00171                                 m_TargetExpressionEntryBuffers[target].erase(m_TargetExpressionEntryBuffers[target].begin(), m_TargetExpressionEntryBuffers[target].end());
00172                         }
00173                 }
00174         }
00175         m_BufferSize = 0;
00176 }
